series_description: This series documents the activities of Library public services staff in receiving and responding to correspondence from the public. This series may include, but is not limited to: incoming correspondence, responses, and logs.
retention_statement: 2 Years after end of state fiscal year

series_description: This series documents the services provided annually to the public by Library staff. This series may include, but is not to: reports.
This series documents the activities of Library public services staff in order to compile the annual report. This series may include, but is not limited to: reports.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of state fiscal year

series_description: This series documents patrons who register to use archival materials in the Archives Research Room in the Library of Virginia or in the State Records Center. This series may but is not limited to: sign-in sheets and registration forms.
retention_statement: 15 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents the requests for duplication of archival materials and the fulfillment of these requests. This series may include, but is not limited to: forms, receipts, and payment information.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of state fiscal year

series_description: This series documents the requests for the use of archival and special collection materials and the service of such materials the patron. This series may include, but is not limited to: pull slips.
retention_statement: 15 Years after end of calendar year
